channel.title: CVE Feed for AMI -- AptioV
channel.description: The latest CVEs for AMI -- AptioV

item.title: CVE-2023-39537|2023-11-14T21:24:32.282Z -- ami -- aptiov
item.description: AMI AptioV contains a vulnerability in BIOS where an Attacker may use an improper input validation via the local network. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of confidentiality, integrity and availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39536|2023-11-14T21:24:02.381Z -- ami -- aptiov
item.description: AMI AptioV contains a vulnerability in BIOS where an Attacker may use an improper input validation via the local network. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of confidentiality, integrity and availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39535|2023-11-14T21:23:24.506Z -- ami -- aptiov
item.description: AMI AptioV contains a vulnerability in BIOS where an Attacker may use an improper input validation via the local network. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of confidentiality, integrity and availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39539|2024-02-21T01:33:19.683Z -- ami -- aptiov
item.description: AMI AptioV contains a vulnerability in BIOS where a User may cause an unrestricted upload of a PNG Logo file with dangerous type by Local access. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of Confidentiality, Integrity, and/or Availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-39538|2024-02-21T01:32:30.784Z -- ami -- aptiov
item.description: AMI AptioV contains a vulnerability in BIOS where a User may cause an unrestricted upload of a BMP Logo file with dangerous type by Local access. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of Confidentiality, Integrity, and/or Availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-34470|2023-09-25T15:57:52.826Z -- ami -- aptiov
item.description: AMI AptioV contains a vulnerability in BIOS where an Attacker may use an improper access control via the local network. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of confidentiality, integrity and availability.

item.title: CVE-2023-34469|2023-09-25T15:58:14.117Z -- ami -- aptiov
item.description: AMI AptioV contains a vulnerability in BIOS where an Attacker may use an improper access control via the physical network. A successful exploit of this vulnerability may lead to a loss of confidentiality.
